en.simple: You are chatting with an AI assistant.

en.voice: This is an AI assistant speaking. Responses are generated automatically.

es.simple: Estás chateando con un asistente de IA.

en.simple: This system uses emotion recognition technology.
en.detailed: This system analyzes emotional expressions from your face, voice, or text. Your emotional data is processed according to GDPR regulations.
en.privacy_notice: Your emotional state data is collected and processed. You have the right to access, correct, or delete this data.

fr.simple: Ce système utilise la technologie de reconnaissance des émotions.
